name: Zixin Chang
story: Feng Hou was born in a small village in the mountains of China. He enlisted in the army at a young age and quickly rose through the ranks due to his natural talent and determination. His skills as a grenadier make him invaluable in the field, and his loyalty to the OPFOR cause is unwavering. Despite his tough exterior, Feng has a soft spot for his fellow soldiers and will do whatever it takes to keep them safe.
